## Avatar.headBoneOffset property

Position offset from the head bone.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get headBoneOffset(): THREE.Vector3;
```

## Example


```ts
  camera.position.copy(
    new THREE.Vector3(0, avatar.getHeadHeight(), 0).add(
      avatar.headBoneOffset
    )
  );
```
